attributes.action: Do not pay (REJECT) the EU supplimental Charge of £1.7M
attributes.additional_details: The recent EU request for a supplemental payment of £1.7M should be rejected and not paid at all.  the UK is not performing as well as the EU and our Government believe.  This money could better be used to support our NHS in the UK for its citizens.

rejection.details: We have already received a similar e-Petition that we are currently considering and will publish in due course.
